name: Sigma Distorted
desc: $market has, at some point in the distant past, been subjected to incredible dimensional stresses, the effects of which persist to the present. Human habitation is out of the question with known technology; merely surviving on the fractured, twisting surface represents a feat of advanced engineering.

name: Magellan City-Warrens
desc: $market is riddled with underground cities dug deep into the bedrock, forming an impenetrable subterranean maze of close-knit neighborhoods and a culture deeply distrustful of outsiders. Attempted invasions must contend not only with a dense network of prepared defenses, but an equally formidable internal system of compartments and armored doors, specially designed to contain the violence of insurgents and rioters.
